Title: Mihr Hunting in the Presence of King Kayvan and His Entourage
Medium: ink and pigments on laid Persian laid paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.627 contains a miniature depicting Mihr hunting in the presence of King Kayvan and his entourage.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Ornament; New Abbasid style; Iran; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown] [bookplate]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Muhammad ibn Ahmad `Assar Tabrizi (died 1382)
